Class JavaFileProcessor

java.lang.Object
com.hado90.judge.compiler.JavaFileProcessor
public class JavaFileProcessor extends Object
Utility class for processing Java files, including finding Java files in a directory and modifying their package declarations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<String>
    findJavaFilesinDirectory(String folderPath)
    Finds all Java files in the specified directory.
    void
    processFile(String javaFilePath, String packageName)
    Processes a Java file by removing its current package declaration and adding the specified package name.

    removePackageDeclaration(String sourceCode)
    Removes the package declaration from the provided source code.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • findJavaFilesinDirectory

      public List<String> findJavaFilesinDirectory(String folderPath) throws IOException
      Finds all Java files in the specified directory. It retrieves the files from the directory and filters out the ones with a ".java" extension.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - the path of the folder to search for Java files.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths that end with ".java".
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while accessing the files in the directory.

    • processFile

      public void processFile(String javaFilePath, String packageName) throws IOException
      Processes a Java file by removing its current package declaration and adding the specified package name. The method reads the file's content, modifies the package declaration, and rewrites the file with the updated source code.
      Parameters:
      javaFilePath - the path to the Java file to be processed.
      packageName - the new package name to be added to the Java file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading or writing the file.

    • removePackageDeclaration

      public String removePackageDeclaration(String sourceCode) throws IOException
      Removes the package declaration from the provided source code. If the source code contains a package declaration at the beginning, it will be removed.
      Parameters:
      sourceCode - the Java source code from which the package declaration should be removed.
      Returns:
      the source code without the package declaration.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the source code.
